MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CH60 postcode area of Heswall, affecting properties in Gayton Road, Lapwing Rise and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:29PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:20PM on 24TH October 2020
